summary: A test suite that validates logging behavior in distributed training setups, using a custom logger to capture entries from every process, a simple model with lifecycle callbacks, and several tests that check logging under DDP (CPU and spawn), logger initialization in subprocesses, and logger functionality after fit and predict calls.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the logging system in a distributed machine learning framework, preventing issues when training across multiple processes and after various training operations.
